relation: Update WIN32 install instructions, and simplify.
Updates for Visual Studio 8 and Visual Studio 9.
We need diffutils as well for cygwin. Thanks to Bastiaan Veelo for pointing this out.
docs: complete spiffing phase for 3.1.0 release, after reading 5000+ lines of ChangeLog and updating NEWS / RELNOTES / etc
Doc: various API doc additions, FIXMEs, code comments, etc.
Info about CL and LINK envvars.
Info on a Cygwin build-problem. Run-time problems with Radeon OpenGL driver.
Debugging help, how to get symbols and source code info in the MSVC++ debugger. By Barbara.
Specific mention of the common 'ld is missing' configure problem.
Explains how to do more stringent checking for a functional cl.exe environment.
A few comments on building as static versus dynamic libraries.
Sync with README-file from stable branch (adds instructions about checking sanity of MSVC++ setup).
Adds Lars' explanation of what the configure script is. Adds some simple layout. FIXMEs about compiling non-default configurations.
Updates to information about building on Win32.
